input.activity_signal: Recent FCC filing (2024-04-30) for interconnected VoIP numbering authorization. Active company website found (allocommunications.com) showing current services. Web search results indicate ongoing operations with fiber services across 50+ locations in multiple states (Nebraska, Colorado, Arizona, Missouri) serving over 1.4 million population. Company founded in 2003 with 20+ years of operations and received SDC Capital Partners investment in 2020.
input.product_summary: ALLO Communications is a telecommunications company providing high-speed fiber internet, television, and phone services to residential and business customers across Nebraska, Colorado, Arizona, and Missouri, serving 53+ cities with 100% direct fiber infrastructure.
